message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.DL, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of table detection and extraction in business documents, particularly invoices, which are layout-heavy and present novel challenges such as tables without outlines and widely varying data content. This problem is closely related to computer vision (cs.CV) and information retrieval (cs.IR) as it involves analyzing the visual and textual content of documents. The paper also proposes a novel neural network model, which falls under the category of deep learning (cs.DL) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Finally, the paper analyzes the performance of the model, which involves evaluating the effectiveness of graph convolutions and self-attention, both of which are topics in machine learning (cs.LG).
